properties.address: Wellbeing Media Studio, Bedford, Bedfordshire MK42 0AS
properties.description: We are open for co-working April 30, and subsequent Wednesdays until June 11, from 10.00-1.30, and then will be closed until OCTOBER when our Warm and Welcome space opens again Facilities: Disabled toilet/wheelchair access Tea and Coffee (in a kitchenette) and we'll have biscuits Free Wifi and charging facilities (ie plugs) TV Small book library/swap Desk/Co Working space Other information: We would like to start activities if we see there is need, and hope to have visits from community support organisations - but we have leaflets and information. We can provide a talking space - as the owner is a qualified Coach and Chartered Psychologist. We can only welcome a maximum of 15 people as our space isn't huge. We don't have specific facilities for children, but they can accompany their parents as long as they are never left without them.
properties.title: Wellbeing Media Studio

properties.address: Bedford Foodbank, 8/9 Murdock Road, Manton Industrial Estate, Bedford, MK41 7PE
properties.description: They don’t think anyone in our community should have to face going hungry. That’s why they provide three days’ nutritionally balanced emergency food and support to local people who are referred to us in crisis. They are part of a nationwide network of foodbanks, supported by The Trussell Trust, working to combat poverty and hunger across the UK. Over the colder winter months, the Foodbank will also act as a Warm hub, providing a safe place which is warm, friendly and welcoming. They offer a lifeline for people in social isolation and those suffering with fuel poverty.
properties.title: Bedford Foodbank & Warm Hub
